About

I am a highly motivated machine learning engineer and data scientist with experience in research. My current research focuses on federated learning as well as ML on the edge, but I also have a more casual interest in reinforcement learning. I am proficient in python, pytorch, numpy, pandas and other popular data science and ML libraries.

I’m currently a student at the University of Maryland majoring in computer science and minoring in statistics. Most recently, I worked as an AI engineer at Renesas, a microchip and semi-conductor company.

Outside of machine learning, I also love to develop games, paint, and cook in my spare time.

Contact

I'd love to hear from you! I'm open to collaborations, especially on open source projects. Interesting work opportunity? Shoot. Just want to have a coffee and talk about stars, cars or Pokémon? Awesome.

Please feel free to write to me for anything: ksang@terpmail.umd.edu (PGP Key). It might take me a day to get back, but rest assured, you'll hear from me.
